remarks.format:
## Remarks Changes to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> are not final until you call the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method. When either <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A> is called on a row in the parent table, the AcceptRejectRule value determines whether or not changes are propagated to corresponding rows in the child table.
